scripts.init: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.go: gulp clean  && gulp build  && gulp rev && gulp rev-fix && gulp rev-views
scripts.nocombo-publish: npm run build && sleep 1 && gulp rev && gulp rev-fix && gulp rev-views
scripts.publish: gulp clean && sleep 1  && gulp build  && sleep 1 && gulp rev && gulp rev-fix && gulp rev-views && gulp preview-combo --useLogic && gulp copy-config
scripts.publish-skip: gulp clean && sleep 1  && gulp build  && sleep 1 && gulp rev --skipV && gulp rev-fix && gulp rev-views && gulp preview-combo  && gulp copy-config
scripts.online-view: npm run nocombo-publish && gulp static-html --envConf  build && gulp ftp-static && gulp ftp-views
scripts.online-preview: npm run nocombo-publish && gulp static-html --envConf build --previews  && gulp ftp-static --previews && gulp ftp-views --previews
scripts.publish-adv: gulp clean && sleep 1  && gulp build  && sleep 1  && gulp rev && sleep 1 && gulp tmp-store && gulp copy-hash-map && gulp rev-fix && gulp rev-build-all && sleep 1 && gulp deps-update-all && gulp rev-fix-deps && gulp rev-views-deps && gulp rev-build-all && gulp preview-combo --useLogic && gulp clean-ana && gulp copy-config
